name: ✅ Complete Booking & Reminder System
overview: Sends 24-hour & 2-hour reminders and tasks after confirmation.
keySteps: Set Event Start Date using cf_appointment_datetime
Wait until 24h before → send 24h email/SMS + add Reminder:24hr_Sent tag
Wait until 2h before → create provider task, send 2h SMS, add Reminder:2hr_Sent tag
notes: Ensure cf_appointment_datetime is populated or add a Date/Time Formatter step before Set Event Start Date.
